name: part_007
file: tmp_【#ラミィ生誕3Dヒーローショー】雪花ラミィ生誕３DLIVE『 ホロレンジャー』ゲスト＆告知あり！【 雪花ラミィ ⧸ホロライブ】 [mjXO5WWADww]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Kizuna Speciality' by NePoLaBo.
Episode title card for the Holo Ranger hero show.
Holo Ranger Hero Show Drama section featuring NePoLaBo members.

subtitles.original: ホラ、キミに届く おいしいの中の たくさんのストーリー
subtitles.english: Look, reaching out to you, so many stories within this deliciousness.

subtitles.original: めぐりめぐって ここにあるって 奇跡みたいだよ
subtitles.english: Going round and round, it's like a miracle that it's here.

subtitles.original: 約束 つなげたい今がある キミと分け合いたい 未来へと
subtitles.english: A promise, there's a "now" I want to connect to a future I want to share with you.

subtitles.original: くじけそうな時も 負けないココロで立ち向かう
subtitles.english: Even when I feel like giving up, I'll face it with an undying spirit.

subtitles.original: みんなの しあわせなエナジーが作る この日々がうれしいよ
subtitles.english: Everyone's happy energy creates these days, and I'm so glad.

subtitles.original: デリシャスにあつまれ！ パーティは続いていくね
subtitles.english: Gather for something delicious! The party is going to continue.

subtitles.original: 世界中 今も それぞれのストーリー
subtitles.english: All over the world, even now, everyone has their own story.

subtitles.original: ひとりずつが できることを がんばってるから
subtitles.english: Because each and every one of us is doing our best with what we can do.

subtitles.original: かならず！ 守りたいこの味は キミと笑いあう毎日の
subtitles.english: For sure! This flavor I want to protect is the daily warmth of laughing with you.

subtitles.original: いちばん側で照らす あたたかい道しるべなんだ
subtitles.english: It's the warm guidepost that shines right by your side.

subtitles.original: みんなと 今胸を熱くする想い 育んでこれからも
subtitles.english: Together, let's nurture these feelings that warm our hearts from now on too.

subtitles.original: 大切に刻もう キズナで結ぶスペシャリティ
subtitles.english: Let's cherish every moment, this specialty bound by our bonds.

subtitles.original: 約束 つなげたい今がある キミと分け合いたい 未来へと
subtitles.english: A promise, there's a "now" I want to connect to a future I want to share with you.

subtitles.original: くじけそうな時も 負けないココロで立ち向かう
subtitles.english: Even when I feel like giving up, I'll face it with an undying spirit.

subtitles.original: みんなの しあわせなエナジーが作る この日々がうれしいよ
subtitles.english: Everyone's happy energy creates these days, and I'm so glad.

subtitles.original: デリシャスにあつまれ！ パーティは続いていくね
subtitles.english: Gather for something delicious! The party is going to continue.

subtitles.original: 大切に刻もう キズナで結ぶスペシャリティ
subtitles.english: Let's cherish every moment, this specialty bound by our bonds.

subtitles.original: 第３話 闇を超えて！ ねぽらぼ絆ビームで奇跡を起こせ！
subtitles.english: Episode 3: Beyond the Darkness! Create a Miracle with the NePoLaBo Bond Beam!

subtitles.original: やっぱりねぽらぼだねー！
subtitles.english: As expected of NePoLaBo!

subtitles.original: ねぽらぼ！ハイ！ ねぽらぼ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: NePoLaBo! High! NePoLaBo! High!

subtitles.original: だいふく、やっと来てくれたー！
subtitles.english: Daifuku, you finally came!

subtitles.original: 許さない... 許さない！
subtitles.english: I won't forgive you... I won't forgive you!

subtitles.original: うわぁぁぁ！
subtitles.english: Waaaaah!

subtitles.original: だ、だいふく...？
subtitles.english: D-Daifuku...?

subtitles.original: やみふく
subtitles.english: Yami-fuku

subtitles.original: まさか、あれは...
subtitles.english: No way, could that be...

subtitles.original: ラミィにかまってもらえず、負の感情が爆発して...
subtitles.english: Since Lamy didn't play with him, his negative emotions exploded...

subtitles.original: 闇落ちした、やみふく...！
subtitles.english: He's fallen to the dark side, it's Yami-fuku...!

subtitles.original: そんな... だいふく、元に戻って！
subtitles.english: No... Daifuku, please come back to your senses!

subtitles.original: うるさーい！
subtitles.english: Shut up!

subtitles.original: きゃぁぁ！
subtitles.english: Kyaaa!

subtitles.original: ラミィ！
subtitles.english: Lamy!

subtitles.original: こうなったら、力ずくでも元に戻してあげる！
subtitles.english: If that's how it's going to be, I'll bring you back by force!

subtitles.original: 元に戻って！
subtitles.english: Return to normal!

subtitles.original: うわぁぁぁ！
subtitles.english: Waaaaah!

subtitles.original: え、え、え？ やりすぎじゃないこれ？
subtitles.english: W-wait, isn't this going a bit too far?

subtitles.original: 凄っ... 大丈夫？
subtitles.english: Wow... is he okay?

subtitles.original: ど、どうだ？
subtitles.english: H-how's that?

subtitles.original: ちくしょーー！
subtitles.english: Damn it!

subtitles.original: だいふく！
subtitles.english: Daifuku!

subtitles.original: あ、ラミィ待って！
subtitles.english: Ah, Lamy, wait!

subtitles.original: ちくしょーー！
subtitles.english: Damn it!

subtitles.original: きゃぁぁ！
subtitles.english: Kyaaa!

subtitles.original: ラミィーーーー！
subtitles.english: Lamyyyyyy!

subtitles.original: かまってー！
subtitles.english: Play with me!

subtitles.original: ヤミィ
subtitles.english: Yami-Lamy

subtitles.original: わぁー、ラミィちゃんが闇落ちさせられたー！
subtitles.english: Oh no, Lamy-chan's been turned to the dark side!

subtitles.original: これでラミィとずっと一緒だ...
subtitles.english: Now I'll be with Lamy forever...

subtitles.original: ラミィが相手でも止めるしかないよ！
subtitles.english: Even if our opponent is Lamy, we have to stop her!

subtitles.original: 確かに、ラミィはタフだしね。まあ、ちょっとくらい痛くても平気でしょ。
subtitles.english: True, Lamy is tough after all. Well, she'll be fine even if it hurts a little.

subtitles.original: お、丁度いいところに。いくよ雪民、手を貸して。
subtitles.english: Oh, perfect timing. Let's go Yukimi, lend us a hand.

subtitles.original: 雪民さん、いっけぇー！ そりゃあ！
subtitles.english: Yukimi-san, goooo! Take this!

subtitles.original: 雪民ごめん！ あぁーー！
subtitles.english: Sorry Yukimi! Aaaah!

subtitles.original: いっけぇーー！
subtitles.english: Goooooo!

subtitles.original: かまって！
subtitles.english: Play with me!

subtitles.original: うわぁぁぁ！
subtitles.english: Waaaaah!
